title: I build Shopify E-commerce Solutions.
list: I install and customize your Shopify theme.
I research and install the ideal Shopify apps to ensure the best functionality for your store.
I integrate your Shopify store with your current CMS, bookkeeping and inventory management systems.

title: I build Headless E-commerce Solutions.
list: I develop custom headless e-commerce systems.
I integrate all your current content, inventory and and payment solutions.

title: Why I do it?
list: I love helping the people that are as passionate as I am.
I ran my own bricks and mortar retail businesses for over 12 years.
I understand the successes and struggles of location dependant retailers.
I understand the beauty and power of e-commerce.

title: Will we work well together?
list: Yes, if you are honest, passionate and committed.
Yes, if you get shit done.
Yes, if you are ready to grow your business.
